FanniePage::addBootstrap (  ) 

Add css and js files required for bootstrap. If a version installed via composer is present, that is the version used.

Returns:
[boolean] success

FanniePage::preprocess (  ) 

Handle pre-display tasks such as input processing

Returns:
  • True if the page should be displayed
  • False to stop here
Common uses include redirecting to a different module and altering body content based on input

FanniePage::tableExistsReadinessCheck ( $  database,
$  table 
)

Helper method Check if a given table exists. Sets an appropriate message in $error_text if the table is not present.

Parameters:

$table [string] table name
Returns:
[boolean]

FanniePage::tableHasColumnReadinessCheck ( $  database,
$  table,
$  column 
)

Helper method Check if a given table has a specific column. Sets an appropriate message in $error_text if the column (or table) is not present.

Parameters:
$database [string] database name
$table [string] table name
$column [string] column name

[boolean]
